00141|       .replace(/\bhij hebben\b/gi, 'hij heeft')
00142|       .replace(/\bHij hebben\b/g, 'Hij heeft')
00143|       .replace(/\bzij hebben\b/gi, 'zij heeft')

00145|       // English grammar fixes
00146|       .replace(/\bi\b/gi, 'I')
00147|       .replace(/\bI\s+am\s+going\s+to\s+went\b/gi, 'I am going to go')
00148|       .replace(/\bYou\s+was\b/gi, 'You were')
00149|       .replace(/\bHe\s+don't\b/gi, 'He doesn\'t')

00151|       .replace(/\bthere\s+house\b/gi, 'their house')
00152|       .replace(/\byour\s+welcome\b/gi, 'you\'re welcome')
00153|       .replace(/\bits\s+a\s+beautiful\s+day\b/gi, 'it\'s a beautiful day')
00154|       // German basic improvements
00155|       .replace(/\bich\s+sind\b/gi, 'ich bin')
00156|       .replace(/\bdu\s+sind\b/gi, 'du bist')
00157|       .replace(/\ber\s+sind\b/gi, 'er ist')
00158|       // French basic improvements
00159|       .replace(/\bje\s+suis\s+aller\b/gi, 'je suis allé')
00160|       .replace(/\btu\s+es\s+aller\b/gi, 'tu es allé')
00161|       // Spanish basic improvements
00162|       .replace(/\byo\s+son\b/gi, 'yo soy')
00163|       .replace(/\btú\s+son\b/gi, 'tú eres')
00164|       // Capitalization
00165|       .replace(/^[a-z]/, match => match.toUpperCase())
00166|       .replace(/\.\s+[a-z]/g, match => match.toUpperCase())
00167|       // Double spaces
00168|       .replace(/\s{2,}/g, ' ')
00169|       .trim()

metadata.preview:
.replace(/\bhij hebben\b/gi, 'hij heeft')
      .replace(/\bHij hebben\b/g, 'Hij heeft')
      .replace(/\bzij hebben\b/gi, 'zij heeft')
      .replace(/\bZij hebben\b/g, 'Zij heeft')
      // English grammar fixes
      .replace(/\bi\b/gi, 'I')
      .replace(/\bI\s+am\s+going\s+to\s+went\b/gi, 'I am going to go')
      .replace(/\bYou\s+was\b/gi, 'You were')
      .replace(/\bHe\s+don't\b/gi, 'He doesn\'t')
      .replace(/\bShe\s+don't\b/gi, 'She doesn\'t')
      .replace(/\bthere\s+house\b/gi, 'their house')
      .replace(/\byour\s+welcome\b/gi, 'you\'re welcome')
      .replace(/\bits\s+a\s+beautiful\s+day\b/gi, 'it\'s a beautiful day')
      // German basic improvements
      .replace(/\bich\s+sind\b/gi, 'ich bin')
      .replace(/\bdu\s+sind\b/gi, 'du bist')
      .replace(/\ber\s+sind\b/gi, 'er ist')
      // French basic improvements
      .replace(/\bje\s+suis\s+aller\b/gi, 'je suis allé')
      .replace(/\btu\s+es\s+aller\b/gi, 'tu es allé')
